description:
The Star Wars franchise has been moving backwards in time for its new Disney Plus series The Acolyte. The series takes place around a century prior to the events of The Phantom Menace. However, some fans have shared complaints regarding the show’s unexpected characters, with The Acolyte showrunner Leslye Headland speaking out against descriptions of [...]

The post ‘The Acolyte’ Creator Responds To Backlash Surrounding ‘Star Wars’ Series appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Acolyte’ Creator Responds To Backlash Surrounding ‘Star Wars’ Series

description:
The addition of Hulu titles on Disney Plus has allowed Disney’s streaming service to offer a much more varied library of content. This includes R-rated titles and those that were previously part of the 20th Century Fox library. Now one such title from that library, a R-rated classic sci-fi movie, is dominating Disney Plus. title: R-Rated Classic Sci-Fi Movie Dominates Disney Plus

description:
Tatiana Maslany starred as the titular character in the divisive Disney Plus MCU series She-Hulk: Attorney at Law. Now Maslany is reflecting back on one of the show’s most controversial and viral scenes, in which She-Hulk begins twerking with none other than Megan Thee Stallion in a post-credits scene. Of course, the She-Hulk comic book [...]

The post ‘She-Hulk’ Star Tatiana Maslany Reflects On Viral Twerking Scene And Other Moments appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘She-Hulk’ Star Tatiana Maslany Reflects On Viral Twerking Scene And Other Moments
